title: New free champion rotation: Jhin, Kalista, Kindred & more!

replies.body: Rito release them please! you have in other countries! wwhy not us :(
Rito you have forgotten about us.
IT HAS BEEN 12 HOURS, I NEED TO TRY OUT YASUO RITO {{item:3070}}
sad boi?

Yasuo again, there are already enough trashuos since last time he came to free rotation, I don't think we need mor rito. Please. But hey, it gives me a reason to pull out mastery seven and sh*t all over some free row kids

Hi all - thanks for the reports about the rotation not updating. There was an issue with the system that changes to the new champion rotation - we've now fixed that up, and you should see the correct rotation shortly.
Thanks Rito <3
It took them 16 hours to release them in Aus
YASSS THEY FINALLY RELEASED THEM

{{champion:37}} again? This's like the 3rd or 4th time in the past 2 months. It might seem like a long gap but it's not. I would like to see other types of supports like taric. Not saying sona isn't great because I main her, but doesn't it seem that some champs still come out a little too often? Even though there is the whole easy to play champs, so lets give everyone a chance to play them system.
Still not released in oce.
